    • addStudentToList

      public int addStudentToList(Person name, String studentID, LocalDate dob)
      This adds a student to the database
      Parameters:
      name - A person object that contains the student's full name
      studentID - A String containing the student's studentID
      dob - A LocalDate containing the student's dob
      Returns:
      An int representing if the student was added successfully or not representing the number of rows updated

    • updateStudentInList

      public int updateStudentInList(String studentIDUpdating, Person name, String studentID, LocalDate dob)

    • removeStudent

      public int removeStudent(String studentID)
      This removes a student from the database based upon the student's studentID
      Parameters:
      studentID - A string containing the student's studentID
      Returns:
      An int representing if the student was removed. It returns a 1 or a 0. It returns 1 if it was removed and a 0 if it wasn't

    • getAllStudents

      public ArrayList<Student> getAllStudents()
      This gets all the students in the database and makes their data back into students again
      Returns:
      An arraylist of student objects

    • getStudents

      public String getStudents()
      Gets all the student objects from getAllStudents and adds them to a string accumulator
      Returns:
      A string of students and their data formatted

    • addModule

      public int addModule(String name, String grade, String studentID)
      Adds a module for a particular student to the module DB
      Parameters:
      name - A string representing the name of the module
      grade - A string representing the grade of the module
      studentID - A string representing the studentID of a student
      Returns:
      An int result if the add of the module was successful or unsuccessful

    • getModulesgreater70

      public String getModulesgreater70(String studentID)
      Gets the Modules for a particular student where they got more than 70 % in
      Parameters:
      studentID - A string representing the studentID for a particular student
      Returns:
      A string containing all of the modules where a student got greater than 70%

    • getModules

      public String getModules(String studentID)
      Gets the modules for a particular student and adds them to a String
      Parameters:
      studentID - A string containing the studentID for a particular student
      Returns:
      A string representing the details of a student and all their respective modules and grades
